extendedInfo.description: Accountability is the best defense against temptation! Ever Accountable helps you to avoid pornography by sending weekly reports of your browsing and app usage to the accountability partners you choose.Your first 14 days are free, $3.99 per month afterward (comparable price in other currencies).Ever Accountable automatically flags adult websites and apps, has great battery life, is hard to circumvent, and provides very clear and helpful reports. Reports are emailed weekly to up to three accountability partners of your choice. They contain the websites you visit and all apps used over the last week. Email reports are easy to read and understand. Adult web sites and apps are automatically highlighted in bold at the top of the report.Features:* Monitors all the internet sites you visit in supported browsers. We support the stock browser, Google Chrome, and Dolphin Browser.* Monitors YouTube and Facebook* Accountability partners will be notified if an unsupported browser is used.* Very difficult to circumvent. Emails are sent by a server, so inappropriate sites you visit will still be reported - even if you uninstall the app after viewing them! Other tricks like wiping the browser history will be noticed andreported on.* Option to remove the icon in the status bar. The app will still run in the background.* Excellent battery and memory performance. All the heavy-lifting is done by a server, so your device won't be burdened with stuff like downloading blacklists, categorizing URLs, or preparing reports.* Accountability partners are notified if you ever uninstall the app. This helps remove temptation.* Helpful reports. The weekly email reports are easy to read and understand. Questionable websites and apps are automatically highlighted.* Searches in popular sites such as Google and Bing are presented clearly and simply; easy to understand.* Secure. All app-to-server communication is secured by SSL, and a security email is sent to you whenever an accountability partner is added to your account.Internet filters help, but often block too much or too little. By holding yourself accountable to another person, you can protect yourself better than any filter ever could!Ever Accountable was released June 11, 2012 after over a year in development. Although it is similar to other apps such as X3Watch, Funamo, and Covenant Eyes, we have worked hard to make Ever Accountable the best-in-class app with robust circumvention protection, easy to read reports, excellent detection for adult sites, and browser support.We believe that you can consistently live an honest, joyful, and respectable life. Please let Ever Accountable help you in that quest!

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Awesome tool best out there! Would love more control over settings. Particularly day of report. Look forward to the Windows version! Install setDNS using OpenDNS family safety filter for a basic filter (works best on root and pro version can be locked)
reviews.author: Randle Bond

reviews.title: Best one out there!!!
reviews.comment: Your app is great and the best one out there cause I searched them all. I am so ecstatic that EverAccountable now supports youtube, facebook, and google chrome. Thank you so much!!! God Bless!
reviews.author: Garrett Empey

reviews.title: Really good app
reviews.comment: Thanks for including Google Crome, You Tube, and Facebook! Still need to add Google Play...  that will get the fifth star.  Thanks again...  Keep up the good work.
reviews.author: Rod Bowden

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Works great, no adverse effects like other products out there.  Thanks for the wonderful accountability tool!   Last update to include Chrome is awesome!   Thanks so much!
reviews.author: Mike Nelson

reviews.title: Works perfectly
reviews.comment: This is the first accountability program I\'ve used for my phone and it should be last. Just know you guys that this accountability app alone isn\'t going to heal you from porn addiction. Obviously there are other steps that have to be taken. But don\'t get me wrong here, this app does its job for me and I am ever grateful for it.
reviews.author: Wilson Hicks

reviews.title: Great tool
reviews.comment: Very impressed with the detailed reports it gives. Facebook was our main problem. It breaks everything down. Wish it was would do 2 reports a week instead of one. Great for accountability
reviews.author: Laura Goucher

reviews.title: Helps Stay Pure
reviews.comment: Usually don\'t rate apps or anything, but this app has been more than a blessing to help me be accountable in my daily living. One of the best apps I own and I intend to keep it around for awhile. Also glad they are continuing support by adding Facebook and Chrome. Very well done and accurate. Great job!
reviews.author: Joseph Mennemeier

reviews.title: Great Program!
reviews.comment: I was excited when I first found this program, and it is super helpful. When I had billing issues the customer service was excellent. They addressed the issue and showed that they value their customers.Very genuine program with sincere staff that show they care about their customers. That is a rare find. Good job! Thank you!
reviews.author: Kenneth Slater

reviews.title: The best out there
reviews.comment: This is by far the best accountability app out there! I\'m very pleased to say that they listened and added on YouTube and chrome coverage! That was the only loophole I had found before that was a problem. Thank you ever accountable for keeping me (and my phone) clean!
reviews.author: Jason Guthrie

reviews.title: The Standard for Mobile Accountability
reviews.comment: I\'ve used Ever Accountable for about a year now and it is superb. By far the best accountability app I\'ve used, and I\'ve attempted several. Being a tech guy, it\'s easy to circumvent other apps-not this one. It really is great! And their customer service is super helpful and replies right away to any issues I\'ve had! Well worth the price for the sake of walking in victory! (If they ever were to develop a PC or Mac app... I\'m already sold!)
reviews.author: Chris Mitchell

reviews.title: Keyboard error
reviews.comment: The new accessibility options screw up the keyboard
reviews.author: Neo Ryan

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Glad they finally sorted out the YouTube monitoring.
reviews.author: dawie thomas

reviews.title: Please fix this!!!
reviews.comment: I bought a year subscription when the free trial started, and when the trial ended, it cancelled my sunscription. Please fix this!! Update: Thank you very much for helping me! Great customer service!
reviews.author: Chad Hughes

reviews.title: Works when you work it
reviews.comment: You want sobriety. If you didn\'t, you wouldn\'t be reading this right now. Whether you are a mature person of faith or just scraped off the pavement this app works if you work it. Get free. Love Jesus. Amen.
reviews.author: Gregory James

reviews.title: Samsung Captivate
reviews.comment: Great app!
reviews.author: Tim Wiebe

reviews.title: Excellent Support
reviews.comment: Suggested adding Dolphin support and the Dev actually did it very quickly, the guy rocks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: The app is best accountable app
reviews.author: Jonathan Williams

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Words cannot express what a journey it has been but im glad this app was here to help me thru all the struggles.
reviews.author: Jonathan Rios

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: No escape full disclosure this app keeps me ever accountable and helps remind me both my heavenly abd earthly fathers are watching over me
reviews.author: Stephen Waples

reviews.title: Great service
reviews.comment: Product is exactly what I wanted. Customer service is very responsive and customer friendly.
reviews.author: Kevin Teeling
